works.complaint:
We are authorised to represent Phil Cropper in relation  
to all risk services including internet defamation.

a.            The website states: “Philip Cropper Scam” “HBB Australia Pty  
Ltd is a Scam run by Mr Philip Cropper” “Philip Cropper race horse scam”  
“it is a Scam” “it is all a Scam, thats right a scam!” “Profit Runner and  
Profit Performer, BGT Global, Track Whispers, Fortune 100, Soft Holgings,  
Nutech Advantage, Betfairly, Redback Gaming, Track Global, Hbb Australia,  
Ahbb,” “Philip Cropper is a con man and a right piece of shit” “Mr Philip  
Cropper is involved in organized crime” “he extorts people, shoots people,  
bashes people, kills people and runs racehorse software scams.” “Philip  
Cropper Racehorse Scam”

The site suggests that Phil Cropper is a scam company and is currently  
operating scams. The site also suggests that Phil Cropper is associated  
with many different companies. This site also suggests that Phil Cropper  
has killed bashed and threatened people. These statements are untrue.

b.            Phil Cropper has never operated a scam. Phil Cropper has not  
been charged, arrested, or convicted of any dishonesty offence. Phil  
Cropper would not be involved with any offences of this nature.

This content has been spread through numerous websites with the intention  
to defame my reputation.

c.             These comments harm my reputation in and cause damage to my  
business. The publishers and distributors of this material would be liable  
for civil damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the possible  
retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims that in am  
engaged in criminal enterprises, this violates Criminal defamation sections  
of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).
